attributes.action: Have a 2nd Brexit referendum; 3 years of young voters voices have not been heard
attributes.background: After three years of chaos it’s time to start counting the opinion of a generation of young voters who could have not been heard.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what question you'd like to be asked in a 2nd EU referendum.

There are already several petitions calling for referenda of different types. You could sign one of these petitions if it calls for something you want to happen. 

You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition, or example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253709

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/263134

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253636

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/272155

There are also petitions about lowering the voting age for general elections and referenda, which you might like to sign f they call for something you'd like to happen.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269437

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/272258
